analysis.description:
FlexibleTokenSale.reclaimTokens (/unique_chucks/8/0xd0b6caf67e3cc44ea888b12acfc807fd258ffb8d.sol#736-746) uses a dangerous strict equality:
	- tokens == 0

Reentrancy in FlexibleTokenSale.buyTokensInternal (/unique_chucks/8/0xd0b6caf67e3cc44ea888b12acfc807fd258ffb8d.sol#632-717):
	External calls:
	- saleBalance = token.balanceOf(address(this)) (/unique_chucks/8/0xd0b6caf67e3cc44ea888b12acfc807fd258ffb8d.sol#649)
	- userBalance = getUserTokenBalance(_beneficiary) (/unique_chucks/8/0xd0b6caf67e3cc44ea888b12acfc807fd258ffb8d.sol#668-670)
	External calls sending eth:
	- walletAddress.transfer(contribution) (/unique_chucks/8/0xd0b6caf67e3cc44ea888b12acfc807fd258ffb8d.sol#700-701)
	State variables written after the call(s):
	- totalEtherCollected (/unique_chucks/8/0xd0b6caf67e3cc44ea888b12acfc807fd258ffb8d.sol#703-706)
	- totalTokensSold (/unique_chucks/8/0xd0b6caf67e3cc44ea888b12acfc807fd258ffb8d.sol#701-702)
ERC20Token.name (/unique_chucks/8/0xd0b6caf67e3cc44ea888b12acfc807fd258ffb8d.sol#276-277) should be declared external
ERC20Interface.name (/unique_chucks/8/0xd0b6caf67e3cc44ea888b12acfc807fd258ffb8d.sol#20-21) should be declared external
